name: Tanks (itch)
description:
Tanks

Have tank fights with your friend in this simple Tank game! Only having the ability to shoot in 8 directions, you'll approach your opponent accusing him of spawn-camping and playing unfair while blaming the game for your losses - Even though you know you're simply not skilled enough to beat your opponent. Will YOU win against your friend?

This is a 2-player game - Make sure you've got a friend to play with next to you!

Current Version: V1.0.1 (Made for TIC-80 Version 0.40.0)

Controls: HAVE TO BE ASSIGNED MANUALLY when first starting the game. Simply press ESC and select "Gamepad Config". F11 for fullscreen.

Also available on the official TIC-80 Website: https://tic.computer/play?cart=192

This game was made in TIC-80.
Inspired by "Combat" (1977).
